Index_draw_end_crop: 1. Draw the end crop area of the image.
Index_draw_start_end_crops: 1.Draw the start and end crop areas of the image.
Index_set_effect_duration: 2. Set the duration of the effect.
Index_click_on_preview: 3. Click on the Preview button to see how the effect will look like.
Index_click_on_render: 4. Once satisfied with the preview, click on the Render button to create the video.
Index_download_generated_video: 5. Download the video or upload it to Wikimedia Commons.
UploadForm_sign_in_to_upload_wikimedia: Please sign in with Wikimedia to upload this file.
UploadForm_sign_in_to_upload_nccommons: Please sign in with NC Commons to upload this file.
UploadForm_file_name_already_exists: File with this name already exists. Using this file name will override the existing file.
UploadForm_file_name_too_long: File name is too long. It should be less than 240 characters.
UpdateArticleSourceForm_sing_in_to_wikim: Please sign in with Wikimedia to Update this article page
UpdateArticleSourceForm_sing_in_to_mdwik: Please sign in with MD Wiki to Update this article page
SearchForm_paste_image_url: Paste the image url or file name here
SearchForm_search_placeholder: Search for images on Commons and NC Commons
